DOC.brief_title: WRx Distal Radius Wrist Fracture Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria The following criterion must meet enrol : 1 . Have close extraarticular distal radius fracture minimally displace intraarticular component 2 . Have fracture classify AO Type A C1 without ulnar styloid fracture 3 . Be male nonpregnant female least 18 year age . 4 . Understand requirement study able provide write informed consent comply study protocol 5 . Have ability understand provide write authorization use disclosure personal health information 6 . Have fracture close reduce acceptable radiographic parameter ( minimum neutral volar tilt , great equal 15 degree radial inclination least 10 mm radial height compare opposite side ) Exclusion Criteria Subjects exclude : 1 . Have follow condition 1 . Concomitant contralateral ipsilateral upper extremity fracture 2 . Ipsilateral ulna ( exclude styloid ) fracture 3 . Open , multifragmentary fracture 4 . Unstable distal radioulnar joint fracture fixation 5 . Artery Nerve injury secondary fracture 2 . Previous ipsilateral distal radius fracture 2 year prior enrollment deformity 3 . Currently chemotherapy radiation therapy 4 . History metabolic disorder affect skeletal system osteoarthritis osteoporosis 5 . History uncontrolled diabetes 6 . History active rheumatologic disease deformity 7 . History chronic pain issue , psychiatric disorder precludes reliable followup 8 . Unable provide consent study 9 . Unable make followup appointment require study
